# Sample User Wants File
# Each line represents a natural language want/preference
# These are semantically matched against job facets for scoring

I want a fully remote position with flexible hours
Looking for Python development work with modern frameworks
Prefer small to medium sized companies with flat hierarchies
Competitive compensation is important to me
Good work-life balance and reasonable hours
Opportunities for learning and professional growth
Company with strong engineering culture and best practices
Interesting technical challenges and impactful work
